body: I've been looking for this one doujin and I think it was by tosh. It was one of the first ones I've read and it was a really good one. It was about a boy who one day needs to replace his dad or uncle or something to be the back rubber for their bathhouse and then the female volleyball team(or not I forgot) suddenly went to their bathhouse and he got to fondle the girls. It's my favorite and I cant find it anymore. He eventually got into a secret relationship with this girl he first fondled. Lmao it's such a great time reading it and I wish I could see it again.
I hope the fakurats don't erase this.
